plants.name: Aningapara
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows fast and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without waterlogging. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Although it blooms in spring, it is beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones at the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: It adapts to both sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On the hottest days, spray water on the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Imbe
plants.about: Medium-sized that adapts to different regions, in addition to being very easy to grow. Win more and more people.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without waterlogging. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Saint George's sword
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps with sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the surrounding soil. Water once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They are indicated because they are easy to maintain and care for. You put it in small vases, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these greens, it is always better to water little. Water once a week.

plants.name: Fruits
plants.about: They require a few hours of sunlight a day, so keep them near windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.about: It brings a sense of tranquility and peace to the environment. It requires little maintenance and is great for those who have little space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Require 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: Com flores delicadas. Elas são ótimas sugestões para decorar o banheiro.
plants.water_tips: No watering the flowers and leaves. Water the soil twice a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: Hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soils.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without waterlogging. Water once a day.
